description: The facility is under "full sanitary lockdown" after a resident tested positive for Coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: Second Greek migrant facility quarantined
title_page: Coronavirus: Second Greek migrant facility quarantined - BBC News
maintext: The patient from Malakasa has been taken to hospital in Athens and the camp, about 40km (25 miles) north-east of the Greek capital, has been placed under "full sanitary lockdown" for 14 days.
